name: Akademia (Demo)
description:
Akademia is a 2D horror game currently being developed in RPG Maker VX Ace. In the province of British Columbia, Canada, there exists a private school in the woods, Rayfair Academy, that is known for its wealth and ambition. The academy has a reputation for also producing highly motivated and overachieving students. However, wandering late at night, six students uncover a secret, and the story of the school’s origin―and the being responsible for it―begins to unravel.

This is the demo version of Akademia, which covers the introduction and beginning of the game.
